author: TMZ Staff
title: Scottie Pippen Hits Clubs without Larsa ... Leaves with Hot Chicks (VIDEO)
text:
EXCLUSIVE
Another big night out for Scottie Pippen ... but this time, no Larsa in sight.
Instead, the ex-NBA star left Bootsy Bellows nightclub on the Sunset Strip with a couple hot chicks in tight dresses.
Of course, it's possible they're all just friends ... we're looking into it.
Scottie and Larsa have been on much better terms lately -- and had appeared to reconcile after he filed for divorce back in October ... but court records show the case is still active.
